mapper.select: SELECT SYEAR,decode(MAN_NUM,0,0,Round((JUVENILE_NUM+ELDERLY_NUM)/MAN_NUM*100,2)) AS BURDEN_NUM, decode(MAN_NUM,0,0,Round(JUVENILE_NUM/MAN_NUM*100,2)) AS JUVENILE_NUM, decode(MAN_NUM,0,0,Round(ELDERLY_NUM/MAN_NUM*100,2)) AS ELDERLY_NUM FROM( SELECT SYEAR,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001003001',T.SNUM,'S001003002',T.SNUM,0)) AS Juvenile_num,--少年 SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001003007',T.SNUM,'S001003008',T.SNUM,'S001003009',T.SNUM,'S001003010',T.SNUM,'S001003021',T.SNUM,0)) AS elderly_num,--老年 SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001003004',T.SNUM,'S001003005',T.SNUM,'S001003006',T.SNUM,'S001003003',T.SNUM,0)) AS MAN_num FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.ZG_STATS_POP T join t_bas_datadict d on t.stype = d.dict_code WHERE d.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and d.dict_pcode ='S001003' and T.ORG_CODE=#{orgCode} GROUP BY SYEAR ORDER BY SYEAR)T1

SELECT SYEAR, Round((SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE, 'S001001012', T.SNUM, 0)) - SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE, 'S001001011', T.SNUM, 0))) / SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE, 'S001001010', T.SNUM, 0)) * 100, 2) AS GROWTH_NUM, Round(SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE, 'S001001012', T.SNUM, 0)) / SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE, 'S001001010', T.SNUM, 0)) * 100, 2) AS BIRTHS_NUM, Round(SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE, 'S001001011', T.SNUM, 0)) / SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE, 'S001001010', T.SNUM, 0)) * 100, 2) AS DEATHS_NUM FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.ZG_STATS_POP T WHERE T.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} AND t.status='1' AND T.STYPE IN ('S001001011', 'S001001012', 'S001001010') GROUP BY SYEAR ORDER BY SYEAR

SELECT t.syear ,sum(decode(t.stype,'S001010005',t.snum,'S001010010',t.snum,'S001010015',t.snum)) as money ,sum(decode(t.stype,'S001010001',t.snum,'S001010006',t.snum,'S001010011',t.snum)) as person ,sum(decode(t.stype,'S001010002',t.snum,'S001010007',t.snum,'S001010012',t.snum)) as new_num ,sum(decode(t.stype,'S001010003',t.snum,'S001010008',t.snum,'S001010013',t.snum)) as over_num FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t where t.status = '1' and t.stype in('S001010005','S001010010','S001010015', 'S001010001','S001010006','S001010011', 'S001010002','S001010007','S001010012','S001010003','S001010008','S001010013') group by t.syear order by t.syear
SELECT stype,sum(t.snum) as snum FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t where t.status = '1' and t.stype in('S001010001','S001010006','S001010011') and t.syear=#{syear} group by stype order by stype

SELECT t.*,g.grid_name FROM ( SELECT t.org_code ,max(t.status) as status ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001010001',T.SNUM,0)) AS ALL_80_NUM--80-89发放总人数(人) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001010005',T.SNUM,0)) AS ALL_80_MONEY--80-89实发金额(元) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001010006',T.SNUM,0)) AS ALL_90_NUM-- ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001010010',T.SNUM,0)) AS ALL_90_MONEY-- ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001010011',T.SNUM,0)) AS ALL_100_NUM-- ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001010015',T.SNUM,0)) AS ALL_100_MONEY FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join t_bas_datadict d on t.stype = d.dict_code and d.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and d.dict_pcode ='S001010' and t.syear=#{syear} GROUP BY t.org_code)t left join T_DC_GRID g on g.info_org_code = t.org_code and g.status = '001' and t.status='1'

SELECT d.dict_name as stypeStr d.dict_level||'级' as stypeStr ,sum(t.snum) as snum from ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join (SELECT d.dict_code,substr(d.dict_name, 0, 2) as dict_name , substr(d.dict_name, 3, 1) dict_level FROM t_bas_datadict d where d.status = '001' and d.dict_pcode = 'S001009') d on t.stype = d.dict_code where t.status = '1' and t.syear = #{syear} group by d.dict_name d.dict_level

SELECT d.dict_name, TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(d.dict_level, 1, t.SNUM, 0))) AS G1, TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(d.dict_level, 2, t.SNUM, 0))) AS G2, TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(d.dict_level, 3, t.SNUM, 0))) AS G3, TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(d.dict_level, 4, t.SNUM, 0))) AS G4, TO_CHAR(SUM(SNUM)) AS SUMNUM from ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join (SELECT d.dict_code, substr(d.dict_name, 0, 2) as dict_name, substr(d.dict_name, 3, 1) dict_level FROM t_bas_datadict d where d.status = '001' and d.dict_pcode = 'S001009') d on t.stype = d.dict_code where t.status = '1' and t.syear = #{syear} group by d.dict_name

SELECT g.grid_name as org_name,sum(t.snum) as snum FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t left join T_DC_GRID g on g.info_org_code = t.org_code where t.syear=#{syear} and g.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and t.stype in (${stype}) group by g.grid_name

SELECT t.*,g.grid_name FROM ( SELECT t.org_code ,max(t.status) as status ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006001',T.SNUM,0)) AS DB_CS_HS_NUM--城市低保户数(户) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006002',T.SNUM,0)) AS DB_CS_RS_NUM--城市低保人数(人) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006003',T.SNUM,0)) AS DB_CS_JE_NUM--城市低保金额(元) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006004',T.SNUM,0)) AS DB_RC_HS_NUM--农村低保户数(户) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006005',T.SNUM,0)) AS DB_RC_RS_NUM--农村低保人数(人) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006006',T.SNUM,0)) AS DB_RC_JE_NUM--农村低保金额(元) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006007',T.SNUM,0)) AS WB_RC_HS_NUM--农村五保户数(户) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006008',T.SNUM,0)) AS WB_RC_RS_NUM--农村五保人数(人) ,SUM(DECODE(T.STYPE,'S001006009',T.SNUM,0)) AS WB_RC_JE_NUM--农村五保金额(元) FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join t_bas_datadict d on t.stype = d.dict_code and d.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and d.dict_pcode ='S001006' and t.syear=#{syear} GROUP BY t.org_code)t left join T_DC_GRID g on g.info_org_code = t.org_code and g.status = '001' and t.status='1'

SELECT sum(t.snum) as snum, t.syear FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join t_bas_datadict d on t.stype = d.dict_code where d.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and d.dict_pcode = #{stype} group by t.syear order by t.syear

SELECT sum(t.snum) as snum, d.dict_name as stypeStr FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join t_bas_datadict d on t.stype = d.dict_code where d.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and d.dict_pcode = #{stype} and t.org_code = #{qsCode} AND T.SYEAR = (SELECT MAX(SYEAR) FROM ZHSQ_SZZG.ZG_STATS_POP T JOIN T_BAS_DATADICT D ON T.STYPE = D.DICT_CODE WHERE D.STATUS = '001' AND D.DICT_PCODE = #{stype} and t.org_code = #{qsCode} AND T.STATUS = '1') group by d.dict_name,d.dict_orderby order by d.dict_orderby

SELECT sum(t.snum) as snum, g.grid_name as org_name FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join T_DC_GRID g on g.info_org_code = t.org_code and g.status = '001' and t.status = '1' join t_bas_datadict d on t.stype = d.dict_code and d.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and d.dict_pcode = #{stype} AND t.syear=(SELECT MAX(t.syear) FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.ZG_STATS_POP T JOIN T_BAS_DATADICT D ON T.STYPE = D.DICT_CODE WHERE D.STATUS = '001' AND T.STATUS = '1' AND D.DICT_PCODE = #{stype}) group by g.grid_name

SELECT t.syear,t.snum, d.dict_name as stypeStr ,t.stype FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join t_bas_datadict d on t.stype = d.dict_code where d.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and d.dict_code in (${stype}) and t.org_code = #{orgCode} order by t.syear,d.dict_code

SELECT t.snum, t.stype, d.dict_name as stypeStr FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t join t_bas_datadict d on t.stype = d.dict_code where d.status = '001' and t.status = '1' and d.dict_code in (${stype}) and t.org_code = #{orgCode} and t.syear =#{syear}

SELECT t.seqid,t.syear,t.org_code,t.snum,stype,d.dict_name stypeStr,g.grid_path AS org_name FROM ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_STATS_POP t, (SELECT * FROM T_DC_GRID g where g.status='001' and g.info_org_code like #{orgCode} || '%') G, (SELECT * FROM t_bas_datadict d where d.status='001' and d.dict_pcode=#{pcode})d where t.org_code=g.info_org_code and t.stype=d.dict_code and t.status='1' and t.stype = #{stype} and t.syear = #{syear} order by t.seqid desc
mapper.update: update ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_stats_pop set syear = #{syear}, org_Code = #{orgCode}, stype = #{stype}, snum = #{snum}, update_id = #{updateId},update_time = sysdate where seqid=#{seqId}
mapper.insert:
insert into ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}ZG_STATS_POP (seqid,SYEAR,ORG_CODE,STYPE,SNUM,create_id,create_time ) select ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.seq_stats_pop.nextval, A.* FROM (
select #{item.syear} as SYEAR,#{item.orgCode} as ORG_CODE, #{item.stype} as STYPE,#{item.snum} as SNUM,#{createId} as create_id,sysdate as create_time from dual ) A

update.foreach: update ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.ZG_STATS_POP T t.snum=#{item.snum} where t.seqid=#{item.seqid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.delete: update ${dbuser.zhsq_szzg}.zg_stats_pop set status='0' where seqid in (${seqIds})
